#### Pam Korda

Several months ago, I sent RJ the WOTFAQ, and I wrote a letter. (The first fan letter I have
*ever*
written, btw.) I asked 3 questions, and they were all answered. (This is due to the type of questions I askedâ€”nothing plot-related.) So, anyway, RJ gave me permission to share the responses, so here goes:
